thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Medivir Q4 sales sharply lower, EBITDA loss at 93 mln SEK

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Medivir Q4 sales sharply lower, EBITDA loss at 93 mln SEK
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Medivir:
* Q4 ‍NET TURNOVER FOR CONTINUING OPERATIONS TOTALED SEK 4.2 MILLION (9.9 M), SEK 4.2 MILLION (7.1 M) OF WHICH COMPRISED Q4‘S ROYALTIES​
* Q4 ‍LOSS BEFORE INTEREST, TAX, DEPRECIATION AND AMORTIZATION (EBITDA) TOTALED SEK -92.6 MILLION (-125.8 M)​
* Q4 ‍CASH FLOW FROM OPERATING ACTIVITIES AMOUNTED TO SEK -88.9 MILLION (-71.8)​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Stockholm Newsroom)
